Sentencas: Solid oxide cell (SOC) is an important technology for hydrogen energy utilization.
Titulo: Progress in metal corrosion mechanism and protective coating technology for interconnect and metal support of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Durability and reliability of metal components including interconnect and metal support of metal-supported SOC are key requirements for the massive production of SOCs.
Titulo: Progress in metal corrosion mechanism and protective coating technology for interconnect and metal support of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Metal corrosion and electrode poisoning caused by elements diffusion under high-temperature working conditions are two main issues.
Titulo: Progress in metal corrosion mechanism and protective coating technology for interconnect and metal support of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: This review concentrates on the anti-corrosion technology of interconnects and metal supports.
Titulo: Progress in metal corrosion mechanism and protective coating technology for interconnect and metal support of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: First, the characteristics of stainless-steel materials commonly used in SOCs and the corrosion mechanisms under oxidizing, reducing, and dual atmospheres are introduced.
Titulo: Progress in metal corrosion mechanism and protective coating technology for interconnect and metal support of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Relevant elements interdiffusion and metal creep degradation are presented.
Titulo: Progress in metal corrosion mechanism and protective coating technology for interconnect and metal support of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Then, typical protective coating materials incorporating reactive element oxides, perovskites, and spinels are reviewed.
Titulo: Progress in metal corrosion mechanism and protective coating technology for interconnect and metal support of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Two composite coatings having a mixture or bilayer structure are discussed.
Titulo: Progress in metal corrosion mechanism and protective coating technology for interconnect and metal support of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Deposition processes involving electroplating, electrophoresis, magnetron sputtering, pulsed laser deposition, electron beam evaporation, screen printing, sol-gel coating, and plasma spraying are summarized and compared.
Titulo: Progress in metal corrosion mechanism and protective coating technology for interconnect and metal support of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Finally, challenges and future research directions are highlighted.
Titulo: Progress in metal corrosion mechanism and protective coating technology for interconnect and metal support of solid oxide cells
